mechanics.trigger: Player character reaches a new level
mechanics.condition: Player character level is 4 OR 6 OR 8 OR 12 OR 14 OR 16 OR 19
mechanics.outcome: Player character gains an Ability Score Improvement opportunity

mechanics.trigger: Player character uses an Ability Score Improvement opportunity
mechanics.condition: Player character chooses to increase ability scores
mechanics.outcome: One ability score increases by 2 OR Two different ability scores each increase by 1

mechanics.trigger: Player character attempts to increase an ability score using this feature
mechanics.condition: The chosen ability score would exceed 20
mechanics.outcome: The ability score cannot be increased above 20 using this feature

description_text: When you reach 4th level, and again at 6th, 8th, 12th, 14th, 16th, and 19th level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. As normal, you can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.
